reviewText: A more restrained Sid James performance and I prefer him that way,but he was funny in his own way. This definitely was Ken Williams,Charlie and Ken Connor,as well as Leslie Phillips movie. Joan and Hattie were great,but not that much to do. The guys were fill-ins  during a flu epidemic,and prove themselves after all the hijinks in the end.
Adult humor when it wasn't vulger or offensive but just good fun. The chacters were great without having to show too much, leaving situations to the imagination.
